      Parameters:

      Returns:
      WardDto model of the Ward with param id

    • createNewWard

      @PostMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<WardDto> createNewWard(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid InputWardDto inputWardDto, org.springframework.validation.Errors errors)
      Parameters:
      inputWardDto - input DTO model of the Ward that has to be created
      errors - that may appear due to invalid input data
      Returns:
      WardDto model of the created Ward

    • updateWard

      @PutMapping("/{id}") public WardDto updateWard(@PathVariable("id") Long id, @Valid @RequestBody @Valid UpdateWardDto updateWardDto, org.springframework.validation.Errors errors)
      Parameters:
      id - of the Ward that will be updated
      updateWardDto - input DTO model of the ward with applied changes
      errors - that may appear due to invalid input data
      Returns:
      WardDto model of the updated Ward

      @DeleteMapping("/{id}") public WardDto deleteWardById(@PathVariable("id") Long id)
      Parameters:
      id - of the Ward that will be deleted
      Returns:
      WardDto model of the Ward that was deleted

      @GetMapping(value="/count", produces="text/plain") public String getCountOfWards()
